conformer_search module¶

conformer_search.conformer_search(mols_filename: str, smiles_col: str, label_col: str, destination_path: str, force_field: str) → None[source]¶

Performs conformer search for phosphines from a DataFrame from a PubChem request.

conformer_search.format_filename_for_orca(filename: str) → str[source]¶

Formats a given filename so it will work properly with ORCA.

conformer_search.lowest_conf_search_from_smiles(smiles: str, label: str, destination_path: str, force_field: str = 'MMFF', num_confs: int = 100, use_seed: bool = False) → None[source]¶

Performs a search for the lowest energy conformer of the mol from input SMILES string, saves as xyz file.
